card.name: Battle Mastery
card.cardText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
card.flavorText: "There is elegance in all the Ojutai do—even their killing." —Kirada, Silumgar enforcer

feedbacks.feedback: Достоинства: Тихий, в целом стало чище. Недостатки: При включении с пульта переключаются каналы спутникого телевидения.

I have edited my review since becoming aware that the 6000 doesn't support hardware encryption my company requires either - which basically means there's no benefit to choosing the 6000 line over the 9000, except for the reliability grade that the 9000 line gets.
初めての一眼レフカメラです。この価格でこの性能ならおススメですね。

card.name: Counterspell
card.flavorText: The pyromancer summoned up her mightiest onslaught of fire and rage. Jace feigned interest.

feedbacks.feedback: Keep calm and Counter target spell.

card.name: Chromatic Star
card.cardText:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
card.flavorText: "This item is not from . . . now. It reflects a sky no longer ours and gleams with hope that does not exist." —Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis
